# Urban Dynamic Soil Properties Discussion 12JAN2023

## Introduction

The University is seeking additional information on other DSP projects in urban areas, such as Los Angeles, to guide the DSP project that will occur as part of this agreement.

## Draft Agenda

-   Overview of NRCS DSP guidelines
-   Overview of LA DSP project: based on climate resiliency and carbon dynamics
-   Site/property access challenges and solutions
-   Lessons learned from LA DSP project
-   Potential sites in TMCA, logistics, timeline
